content: cross posting a relevant discussion from #t-libs https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/219381-t-libs/topic/fmt.3A.3AResult.20doesn't.20allow.20having.20an.20error.20message
I don't have anything to add, not sure its something we should worry about / can fix / should fix, but I wanted to document it
Guys, there is a stream called t-compiler/help. Is that the group I would make an inquiry to about the procedural macro for assert! ?
worse case you will be told a better place to ask if it's the wrong place and moving a thread is easy in zulip :smile:

@Charles Ellis O'Riley Jr. Just a super friendly note that we can be a little more inclusive than ‚Äúguys‚Äù by using more gender-neutral terms like ‚Äúall‚Äù or ‚Äúeveryone‚Äù üôÇüôè Thanks for diving in and helping out with the group!
(i generally use folks and works well for a gender-neutral term and another option )
Sorry about the gender neutrality. Thanks for pointing it out.:pray:
